title: check-advisories Github Action fails due to unmaintained `instant` crate.

labels.name: D-Trivial
labels.description: Nice and easy! A great choice to get started with Bevy

labels.name: A-Build-System
labels.description: Related to build systems or continuous integration

labels.name: C-Dependencies
labels.description: A change to the crates that Bevy depends on

labels.name: S-Blocked
labels.description: This cannot move forward until something else changes

body:
## Bevy version

6741e01df

## What you did

- Ran `cargo deny check advisories` (same thing as the Github Action).

## What went wrong

```
error[unmaintained]: `instant` is unmaintained
    ┌─ E:\Content\bevy/Cargo.lock:293:1
    │
293 │ instant 0.1.13 registry+https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index
    │ ━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ unmaintained advisory detected
    │
    ├ ID: RUSTSEC-2024-0384
    ├ Advisory: https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2024-0384
    ├ This crate is no longer maintained, and the author recommends using the maintained [`web-time`] crate instead.

      [`web-time`]: https://crates.io/crates/web-time
    ├ Solution: No safe upgrade is available!
```
